title: Decouple and Package AI Lab Framework
description: Initiative to decouple the AI Lab Framework from the live data directory, package it as a standalone, configurable application, and define a clear process for deployment and data migration.
acceptance_criteria: Framework can be run with a configurable data path.
A deployment script exists to create new, clean instances of the framework.
Data migration path is confirmed to be a simple file copy.
The standalone framework is fully tested and validated against the original.

sub_tasks.title: Phase 1: Finalize Decoupling & Configuration
sub_tasks.description: Make the data source fully configurable by reading the data path from application settings.
acceptance_criteria: JsonFile repositories read their data path from core.config settings.
A DATA_ROOT_PATH setting is added to core/config.py.

sub_tasks.title: Phase 2: Create a Packaged 'Deployment'
sub_tasks.description: Create a simple, repeatable process to 'deploy' a clean instance of the framework.
acceptance_criteria: A 'make deploy' target exists in the Makefile.
The deployment script successfully creates a new, runnable instance with its own data folder and .env file.

sub_tasks.title: Phase 3: Validation, Testing, and Migration
sub_tasks.description: Verify the decoupled framework and confirm the data migration path is simple.
acceptance_criteria: Automated tests pass when running the framework against a copy of the real data.
Unit tests using the Mock Repositories are successful.
The data migration process is documented in the README.

sub_tasks.title: Create Anonymized Test Data Set and Strategy
sub_tasks.description: Develop a strategy for creating and using abstracted, anonymized test data. Implement a script to generate this data and integrate its use into the deployment and testing workflow.
acceptance_criteria: A dedicated 'test_data' directory exists within the standalone project.
A script is available to generate anonymized test data for ideas, projects, and work items.
The 'make deploy' target can optionally copy this test data into a new instance.
Tests are configured to use this anonymized test data.

sub_tasks.title: Phase 4: Identify and Document Framework Files for Future Relocation
sub_tasks.description: Identify all remaining framework-related files and folders in the root directory that *could* eventually be moved into the standalone project. Document their purpose and dependencies. The actual relocation will be a separate, later decision, dependent on the maturity and robustness of the standalone framework.
acceptance_criteria: A comprehensive list of framework-related files/folders in the root is documented.
Each item's purpose and dependencies are described.
A clear recommendation for future relocation is provided.

notes: This work item tracks the strategic initiative to make the AI Lab Framework a truly independent and deployable piece of software.
